resources.string: This app needs to be granted the location permission in order to use bluetooth.
You have been in potential contact with an infected. Please get yourself tested. More details:
Notifications about COVID-19 contact tracing activity
We have currently no data that indicates you had contact with an infected person

This app collects the contacts you have with others to inform you if you had contact with a potential infected or to inform others of your potential infection. This data collection is done as privacy conscious as possible:

  • Data is collected locally on your phone and only leaves your phone when you are infected
  • Contact data is anonymized
    • Contact data older than two weeks is deleted-->

More information
There are currently no active devices in close proximity
Your device will trace other devices in your vicinity
When somebody gets infected that you met, you\'ll get a notification with further instructions
Bluetooth needs to be enabled to be able to scan for nearby devices
Location access needs to be enabled to scan for nearby devices
